title: Topic 001 Question 269
body: A company is developing a mobile shopping web app. The company needs an environment that is configured to encrypt all resources in transit and at rest.
A security engineer must develop a solution that will encrypt traffic in transit to the company's Application Load Balancer and Amazon API Gateway resources.
The solution also must encrypt traffic at rest for Amazon S3 storage.
What should the security engineer do to meet these requirements?
options: Use AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) for encryption in transit. Use AWS Key Management Service for encryption at rest.
Use AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) for encryption in transit and encryption at rest.
Use AWS Key Management Service for encryption in transit. Use AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) for encryption at rest.
Use AWS Key Management Service for encryption in transit and encryption at rest.
